description.en:
"Remme is an ecosystem of Identity and Access Management products with a digital key at its heart. Founded in 2015, Remme is building the decentralized Public Key Infrastructure protocol and PKI-enabled apps to address the challenges of Web 3.0.

Remme Protocol aims to become the next-generation blockchain-based PKI alternative. It is open-source and customizable to suit business needs. Remme Protocol provides a basis for establishing self-sovereign and authority-issued identities, with a host of use cases.

Remme Auth is a 2-click authentication solution that allows users to securely access a website without passwords. Instead, the solution uses Web Cryptography API and blockchain technology.

With the Protocol being built on EOSIO codebase, REMChain is an independent blockchain fueled by the REM token. REM is an ERC-20 token on Ethereum with the permanent possibility to swap it to REMChain native tokens in both directions."

ico_data.short_desc: Passwordless authentication for humans and devices
ico_data.description: 65% of confirmed data breaches involve weak, default, or stolen passwords and cybercrime costs the global economy around $400 billion annually. REMME is building the distributed Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) solution, which prevents phishing, server and password breach, and utilize SSL/TLS protocol to protect the entire channel from attack. The REM token powers all operations within the ecosystem including certificate generation, revocation, and rewarding of nodes which safeguard the network.

status_updates.description:
REMChain has shipped - the next-gen PKI Protocol is live! Jump straight into the mainnet field by taking up one or two roles:
- Block Producer runs a full node to guarantee REMChain decentralization and distribution. More details here >>https://remme.io/blog/whos-who-on-remchain
- Guardian delegates the vote to trusted Block Producers. Check out the guide with everything about staking, voting, and getting rewards >>https://remme.io/blog/guardian-101-stake-vote-get-rewards
See you there!

New in #REMChain mainnet:
- Merge with #eosio v2.0.3  
- Delegating bandwidth doesn't update vote power and the date it was cast 
- Voting for no BPs doesn't brake the vote power value 
- Account creation fee is dynamically set to $0.5 or min account stake

Check out our Block Explorer >> https://remchain.remme.io

Attention to forward-thinking IAM, cybersecurity and PKI solution providers! Join the first ever industry-specific public blockchain: drive innovation, get new revenue streams, attract clients seeking secure solutions for the modern web! 

Read more: https://remme.io/blog/remchain-mainnet-goes-live-bringing-next-gen-pki-to-enterprises-for-the-first-time
REMChain mainnet speeding up. Good first month so far. Our plan doesn't change: produce blocks, grow the network >> https://twitter.com/remme_io/status/1218267388065566720

REMChain mainnet updates: 
Swap page: boosted swap speed
Account page: fixed Estimated Reward formula, added Voted by field
Remnode: merged with #eosio v2.0.0-rc3, reworked swap plugin
System contracts: fixed bugs with account creation, swap approvals

Check out our Block Explorer >> https://remchain.remme.io
$REM is now available on Bloks .io, the fastest #EOSIO block explorer and wallet. Now you can check TXs and accounts, vote for #BlockProducers, and more from our page >> https://remme.bloks.io

$REM is now featured at MasternodePRO, the comparison tool listing transparent and accurate masternode statistics. 
Check out our page >> https://masternodes.pro/stats/rem/statistics
